page.title: 09INDUSTRY/EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Although{farming predominates}it is not labour-intensive, and the majority of{people work outside the area.
The{two pubs}and{restaurant}provide some employment, especially part time at weekends.
The{garage}offers many services - sale of petrol and diesel, MOT tests, body and engine repairs, breakdown service. It also sells sweets, cigarettes and motoring accessories. It employs two full time mechanics, in addition to the owner, and also part time petrol pump attendants.
The{agricultural engineering works carries out repairs to farm machinery for local farmers.
